value: This workbook is a design reference. Production tagging must be reproducible from DB snapshot + rule JSON + overrides.
schema hardening: aliases/deprecations, qualifier facets, pattern coverage map, direct vs derived facets
Theme layer: multi-label deck descriptors derived from primitives+facets+motifs; UX/retrieval oriented, not strategy identity
Full Theme parity expansion + Typal/Package system + type facets hardening
Added 16 new primitives; added 3 new facets; added rules hardening sheets; updated Pattern_Coverage_Map
Deterministic RuleSpec Pack: rule families, priorities, evidence model, coverage audit, expanded test vectors, theme->primitive dependency audit
This workbook is still design-only; production uses exported JSON packs version-locked to db_snapshot_id + ruleset_version
Commander Contract Layer + Synergy Edge Templates + Structural Role Framework + Temporal/Delayed Trigger Modeling + RuleSpec/Test expansions
Structural quota enforcement + commander dependency model + dilution metrics + counterfactual triggers + profile defaults (B3)
Backbone node policy + Access coverage + Protection delivery modeling + Player survival role integration
Redundancy clusters + equivalence classes + deterministic matching rules + backbone redundancy satisfaction
Runtime performance spec + caching + inverted indices + need buckets + deterministic niche-preserving candidate selection + bounded graph rules + instrumentation
Deprecation policy + stable index maps + patch pack spec + unknown review workflow + compatibility rules
Deterministic tag QA rules + consistency constraints + drift detection findings spec + optional patch templates (not auto-applied)
RuleSpec deterministic extractor: normalization + facet registry + rule patterns + evidence span policy + export modules
RuleSpec expansion: ETB/LTB/dies triggers, token creation vs copy, replacement doublers, blink, recursion variants, extra turns/combats, proliferate/populate, sacrifice-as-cost vs effect

RuleSpec expansion: spellslinger/cast-chain/storm, impulse draw & play-from-exile, cost reduction & mana generation, spell copy, cantrips, wheels, tutor-to-top, extra_upkeeps, magecraft-like triggers, commander-cast triggers scaffolding

RuleSpec expansion: artifacts/enchantments engines, activated abilities, tap/untap, affinity/improvise, equipment/auras/sagas/constellation, artifact/enchant recursion, sacrifice artifact outlets, mana rocks
RuleSpec expansion: combat pressure engines (attack/combat-damage triggers), evasion keywords, goad/forced combat, pillowfort/prison combat taxes, fog effects, damage doubling (combat) scaffolding

RuleSpec expansion: stack interaction (counterspells/can't be countered), timing locks (split second), permission/denial (can't cast, can cast only, cast restrictions), rule-setting effects, stax/tax scaffolding, protection-from-interaction facets

RuleSpec expansion: card-flow engine specificity (wheels, loot/rummage, impulse/exile draw, draw replacement, hand-size rules), discard pressure (each opponent discards), draw denial (can't draw extra / skip draw step) scaffolding

RuleSpec deepening: explicit zone transitions, delayed-return templates, exile-and-return, end-step timing, death/leave replacements, token-as-copy/return-as-token scaffolding, doubling (tokens/counters) and replacement-effect hardening for synergy discovery
